cast.overview: Ryota Nonomiya is a successful businessman driven by money. He learns that his biological son was switched with another child after birth. He must make a life-changing decision and choose his true son or the boy he raised as his own.
cast.title: Like Father, Like Son

details.biography: Arata Iura (井浦 新 Iura Arata, born September 15, 1974 in Hino City, Tokyo), was previously known as Arata, is a Japanese actor, model and fashion designer. He is the Director of fashion brand Elnest Creative Activity. He helds also the position of Director at the Artisan Culture Organisation Institute. He belongs to Tencarat Entertainment Office.
details.name: Arata Iura
